item.title: Rob Reiner and his wife found dead in Los Angeles home
item.description: Director-actor Rob Reiner and his wife Michele were found dead Sunday at Reiner's Los Angeles home, according to a law enforcement official.

item.title: Houses floated away in this Alaska Native village. Now residents want to move
